reviews.subject: Calculus
reviews.review: Dr. Johnson is very knowledgeable and explains concepts clearly. However, the homework assignments are quite challenging.

reviews.subject: Chemistry
reviews.review: Dr. Smith is passionate about chemistry, but his lectures can be disorganized. The lab work is where the class really shines.

reviews.subject: History
reviews.review: Dr. Lee is an exceptional historian with engaging lectures and a deep understanding of the material. Highly recommend her class.

reviews.subject: Biology
reviews.review: Dr. Brown is knowledgeable but the course is very lecture-heavy and lacks interactive elements.

reviews.subject: Computer Science
reviews.review: Dr. Davis makes complex topics accessible and is always willing to help students outside of class. The programming assignments are very challenging.

reviews.subject: Physics
reviews.review: Dr. Wilson is a decent professor, but his lectures can be hard to follow. The exams are quite tough.

reviews.subject: Psychology
reviews.review: Dr. Martinez is fantastic! Her lectures are engaging and she encourages critical thinking. She's also very approachable.

reviews.subject: Economics
reviews.review: Dr. Taylor provides real-world applications to economic theories which makes the class interesting. However, the grading can be tough.

reviews.subject: Literature
reviews.review: Dr. Thompson brings literature to life with her dynamic teaching style. Her feedback on assignments is very insightful.

reviews.subject: Engineering
reviews.review: Dr. Anderson is knowledgeable but the course structure is somewhat lacking. More practical examples would be helpful.

reviews.subject: Art History
reviews.review: Dr. White has a deep passion for art and it shows in her lectures. The class is very visually stimulating, though the workload can be heavy.

reviews.subject: Statistics
reviews.review: Dr. Harris is competent but his teaching style can be monotonous. The course is very data-driven and could use more practical applications.

reviews.subject: Philosophy
reviews.review: Dr. Clark challenges students to think deeply about philosophical issues. The class discussions are stimulating, though some may find the material abstract.

reviews.subject: Sociology
reviews.review: Dr. Lewis is an excellent professor who fosters a great learning environment. His assignments are thought-provoking and relevant to current social issues.

reviews.subject: Mathematics
reviews.review: Dr. Robinson has a clear teaching style and is very supportive. The pace of the course can be fast, but she offers extra help sessions.

reviews.subject: Geography
reviews.review: Dr. King is knowledgeable but the class could benefit from more interactive elements. The exams are straightforward but require thorough study.

reviews.subject: Environmental Science
reviews.review: Dr. Scott is passionate about environmental issues and his enthusiasm is contagious. The course includes hands-on projects that are both educational and enjoyable.

reviews.subject: Business Administration
reviews.review: Dr. Adams provides practical business insights and real-world examples. The coursework is demanding but valuable for understanding business concepts.

reviews.subject: Political Science
reviews.review: Dr. Walker is knowledgeable about political systems, but his lectures can be dry. The course content is relevant but could use more interactive elements.

reviews.subject: Music
reviews.review: Dr. Nelson is an inspiring music professor who brings a lot of energy to her classes. Her feedback on performances is very constructive and encouraging.

reviews.subject: Astronomy
reviews.review: Dr. Moore is enthusiastic about the subject and his lectures are engaging. The observational assignments are a highlight of the course.

reviews.subject: French
reviews.review: Dr. Green is an excellent language teacher who makes learning French enjoyable. Her classes are interactive, though the pace can be a bit fast for beginners.
